mods.abstract: Desert dwellers at an unknown location; color tinted image of two men and a child before tents and other goods; camels and other structures (background); "No. 31. (Registered) BICHARIS HUT Lichtenstern & Harari, Cairo." in gold at bottom of print.

titleInfo.title: Nineteenth and Early Twentieth Century Images of Egypt

location.physicalLocation: Frank H. McClung Museum of Natural History and Culture
